Title: Vite's server.fs.deny bypassed with /. for files under project root
Description: The contents of files in [the project `root`](https://vite.dev/config/shared-options.html#root) that are denied by a file matching pattern can be returned to the browser.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 4.5.14, all versions starting from 5.0.0 before 5.4.19, all versions starting from 6.0.0 before 6.1.6, all versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.7, all versions starting from 6.3.0 before 6.3.4
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 4.5.14 before 5.0.0, all versions starting from 5.4.19 before 6.0.0, all versions starting from 6.1.6 before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.7 before 6.3.0, all versions starting from 6.3.4
